src:
FOTO in VIDEO: Jelinčič, kot ga nismo vajeni: Bil sem zaljubljen
Moniko je na sodišču spremljal novi partner.
07 Nov 2019, 13:23 by N. B.



Burno zaslišanje na sodišču. FOTO: S. N.



Monika izjav ni želela dajati. FOTO: S. N.



Monikin novi partner je hodil vsaj meter pred njo. FOTO: S. N.


Na okrožnem sodišču v Ljubljani sta se prvič srečala Zmago in Monika Zupanc Jelinčič. Njo je spremljal novi partner Rok Miklič, ki je spominjal bolj na osebnega stražarja, saj je bil vselej en meter pred damo. Vzporedno z ločitvenim procesom namreč poteka ločen postopek, saj poslanec SNS zahteva razveljavitev darilne pogodbe, v kateri so leta 2014 zapisali, da svoji ženi podarja dobrih 667 tisoč evrov, šlo pa naj bi za njegove prihranke in zaslužke od prodanih umetnin. Kot poudarja Jelinčič, je bil ta denar namenjen izključno za nakup parcele na morju, ki sta si jo tako želela. Prvi dan na sodišču ni manjkalo opazk, obtožb in celo smeha.To je po prvem dnevu na sodišču povedal Jelinčič:





Monika izjav ni želela dajati. FOTO: S. N.

V okviru tega naroka je sodnica Jadranka Juhant najprej poskušala z zmerno rešitvijo spora, a poravnave niso dosegli. Jelinčič namreč trdi, da je denar takrat podaril, ker je bil v Moniko zaljubljen in jo je želel osrečiti ter obdariti z vilo na morju. Trdi tudi, da je bila darilna pogodba sklenjena šele tri leta kasneje, ker ga je takrat Monikina mama posvarila, naj pazi, kako ravna s svojim premoženjem.Jelinčičeva – za zdaj še soproga – pa po drugi strani poudarja, da je s soprogom sklenila pogodbo zato, ker so ji tako svetovali finančni svetovalec, odvetnik in mož. Na vprašanje sodnice, ali je takrat ni zanimalo, kaj podpisuje, je Monika odgovorila, da moža nikdar ni smela »kaj preveč spraševati«, saj da se ga je bala. Na vprašanje sodnice, ali je torej pogodbo podpisala pod prisilo, Monika ni neposredno odgovorila, je pa zagotovila, da nikakor ni šlo za darilo, temveč skupno premoženje.Sodeč po današnjem vzdušju na sodišču, borba med zakoncema še zdaleč ni končana in bo še kako napeta. Obravnava se bo nadaljevala v začetku decembra, in sicer ravno na miklavža. Koga od njiju bo letos bolj bogato obdaril, bomo videli že v kratkem.


Monikin novi partner je hodil vsaj meter pred njo. FOTO: S. N.
text:
PHOTO AND VIDEO: Jelincic, as we are not used to it: I was in love
Moniko was accompanied in court by a new partner.
07 Nov 2019, 12:23 by N. B.



Harsh hearing in court. PHOTO: С. Н.



Monica refused to make statements. PHOTO: С. Н.



Monica's new partner walked at least a meter in front of her. PHOTO: С. Н.


Zmago and Monika Zupanc Jelinčič first met at the Ljubljana District Court. She was accompanied by new partner Rok Miklič, who was more like a personal guard, as he was always one meter ahead of the lady. In parallel to the separation process, a separate process is under way, as the SNS MP requests the cancellation of a gift contract, which in 2014 stated that he was donating more than € 667,000 to his wife, and that his savings and earnings from the artworks were sold. As Jelinčič points out, this money was intended exclusively for the purchase of the land offshore they so desired. The first day in court was not lacking in remarks, accusations and even laughter. Jelincic said after the first day in court:





Monica refused to make statements. PHOTO: С. Н.

As part of this hearing, Judge Jadranka Juhant first attempted a moderate resolution of the dispute, but no settlement was reached. Jelinčič claims that he donated the money at the time because he was in love with Monika and wanted to make her happy and gift him with a villa at sea. He also claims that the gift contract was only made three years later because Monika's mother had warned him at the time to watch his property.Jelinčič's wife, for now, stresses that she had contracted with her husband because she was so advised by a financial advisor, lawyer and husband. When asked by the judge whether she was not interested in what she was signing at the time, Monika replied that she should never have "asked her too much" since she was afraid of him. Asked by the judge whether she signed the contract under duress, Monika did not answer directly, but assured that it was not a gift but a common property. According to the atmosphere in court today, the fight between the spouses is far from over and will still be tense. The hearing will resume at the beginning of December, namely at Miklavž. Which one of them will be more richly endowed this year, we will see shortly.


Monica's new partner walked at least a meter in front of her. PHOTO: С. Н.
